TdescFragTag.name: tests
TdescFragTag.description: Test set the sim will need to pass to be able to wear the outfit corresponding to the tuned tags. For a given category, the generator should include an 'OutfitCategory' in it's Tags to match the intent. NOTE: Using the additional 'OutfitCategory' tag will restrict acceptable CAS items. If you're unhappy with the generated outfits, you should consider testing for if a Style tag has been chosen and if so, using a generator without the specified OutfitCategory. This is more noticeable with less active packs.
